text: Mbe zegap, kav kha nzambaren ana muuŋgi, “Guman Rum, nza kaŋgi, ndun buni nzerara, ndu nzerara bunin vhuuiŋra kha gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav mbe nzuai. Ndu vhɨra kha tɨvi ga mbui, ndu mba nzuai buni, ndu ntan za kha gumgi ga nzuai. Ndu zɨ ki gumgi hiav, zɨ ki fhuv gumgi hiav, kha bunin mbe nzuai fhuvara. Ndu vhɨra buni guarira kha gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuav Fhe Bakɨmen tɨvir mbe khɨvi.”
